data.name: Yours Truly
data.detailed_description:
Yours Truly is an emotional journey about rediscovering one's self, learning to love one's self, and finding the courage to follow one's heart. Developed by a one-man team in hopes of connecting with others.

STORY


Play as Liam an ordinary office worker unhappy with the lack of fulfillment in his life. Even though he has a good job, a nice place, and can afford most things, he can't help but stay up late in the night feeling lost, and regretful. "There has to be more to my life", "How can I find happiness?", and "Where do I find the courage to live life?" are consistent nagging voices in his head. One night Liam dreamt of his dead parents waking him, instead, he wakes up and finds himself in a strange place. Help Liam go on a journey to reconnect with his past, rediscover himself, and find his way home.

GAMEPLAY


Players must skillfully and cleverly take control of Liam to help him find himself through his journey. Throughout this strange place, players will find progressively challenging obstacles, puzzles, side quests, and hidden encounters that will lead Liam home.

FEATURES

  • Explore beautifully designed levels



  • Solve progressively difficult & fun puzzles



  • Master the 3 skills of the Dreamwalker and use them to find hidden artifacts, sidequests, and encounters




  • Meet and talk with both the locals and visitors of the Inbetween



  • Discover and learn about the Inbetween and its connection to the physical and spiritual world



  • Collect Memory Shards that'll unlock Liam's suppressed memories and determine Liam's Story



  • Multiple Endings

data.short_description: Yours Truly is an emotional 3rd person narrative-driven game with elements of exploration, puzzles, and platforming. Centered around Liam who is stranded in a strange world searching for his true self, and purpose while finding a way home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: intel Core i3-2120 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 760 / Radeon R7 260X
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
